title: High End PSA T206 Polar Bears For Sale
author: T206Cards

posts.post_title: High End PSA T206 Polar Bears For Sale
posts.post_content:
Some High End PSA Polar Bears Available!  Prices firm on singles, small amount of room to negotiate on multiples.  All prices include insured shipping and will be well packaged.
SOLD - T206 Ed Willetts Willett Polar Bear Back PSA 4 VGEX 
T206 Tom Downey Batting Polar Bear Back PSA 4 VGEX $225
T206 Addie Joss Pitching Polar Bear Back PSA 4 VGEX $1000
T206 Gabby Street Catching Polar Bear Back PSA 4 VGEX $200   T206 Paul Davidson Polar Bear Back PSA 4.5 VGEX+ $275 
SOLD - T206 George Moriarty Polar Bear Back PSA 3 VG 
T206 Heinie Wagner Bat on Right Polar Bear Back PSA 4 VGEX $225
T206 Dots Miller Pittsburg Polar Bear Back PSA 4.5 VGEX+ $225   
SOLD - T206 Jerry Freeman Polar Bear Back PSA 5 EX
